Message.Issue: Mark the entry point method 'Program.Main(string[])' in assembly 'ZktAttendence.exe' with an STAThreadAttribute.

Message.TypeName: Do not dispose objects multiple times
Message.Issue: Object 'file' can be disposed more than once in method 'AttendenceDataWriteInTxt.consoleProcessForAttendence(string)'. To avoid generating a System.ObjectDisposedException you should not call Dispose more than one time on an object.: Lines: 155

Rule.TypeName: Do not dispose objects multiple times
Rule.Name: Do not dispose objects multiple times
Rule.Description: A correctly implemented Dispose method can be called multiple times without throwing an exception. However, this is not guaranteed and to avoid generating a System.ObjectDisposedException you should not call Dispose more than one time on an object.
Rule.Resolution: Object {0} can be disposed more than once in method {1}. To avoid generating a System.ObjectDisposedException you should not call Dispose more than one time on an object.: Lines: 155

Rule.Name: Mark Windows Forms entry points with STAThread
Rule.Description: Assemblies that reference System.Windows.Forms should have the STAThreadAttribute. Failure to apply this attribute will most likely result in an application that does not work. Windows Forms relies on a number of components that use the STA model.
Rule.Resolution: Mark the entry point method {0} in assembly {1} with an STAThreadAttribute.
